text: "Clampdown" is a 1980 song by English punk rock band The Clash. It is the second single from their third studio album London Calling. It was released in Australia with its B-side single The Guns of Brixton. It was not released in other territories, with the exception of US promos. It was covered by the Indigo Girls for their 2005 album Rarities. title: Clampdown
